explore.title: Explore the Marketplace
explore.subtitle: Search for products and services or browse categories.

form.slugHint: Use only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens.

onchain.catalogDescription: Publish your product and service catalog to IPFS

footer.tagline: The Digital Nation of Popular Economy
footer.about_desc: Real decentralization for markets, freelancers and small merchants
footer.governance_desc: Democratic DAO with direct citizen voting

hero.title: The Digital Nation of Popular Economy
hero.subtitle: Real decentralization for markets, freelancers and small merchants
hero.description: Bazari is a decentralized Super App that connects producers and consumers without intermediaries. Democratic governance, own currency (BZR) and complete digital sovereignty.

modules.title: Ecosystem Modules

wallet.title: Multi-Asset Wallet
wallet.description: Manage BZR, LIVO and other tokens. Decentralized backup and social recovery.

modules.wallet_desc: Manage BZR, LIVO and other tokens. Decentralized backup and social recovery.

marketplace.title: P2P Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell without intermediaries. Direct payments in BZR with automatic cashback in LIVO.

modules.marketplace_desc: Buy and sell without intermediaries. Direct payments in BZR with automatic cashback in LIVO.
modules.dao_desc: Vote on proposals, create SubDAOs and participate in network decisions.
modules.p2p_desc: Exchange BZR with other users without intermediaries.
modules.dex_desc: Trade SubDAO tokens in automatic liquidity pools.
modules.social_desc: Connect with merchants and consumers in your region.

studio.title: Bazari Studio
studio.description: Create custom systems with our decentralized low-code platform.

modules.studio_desc: Create custom systems with our decentralized low-code platform.

governance.title: DAO Governance
governance.description: Vote on proposals, create SubDAOs and participate in network decisions.

about.title: About Bazari
about.text: Bazari is a decentralized infrastructure built specifically for the popular economy. Our mission is to empower markets, freelancers and small merchants with real digital sovereignty.

cta.title: Ready for the Popular Economy Revolution?
cta.description: Join thousands of merchants, producers and consumers building the decentralized future of commerce.
cta.primary_title: Click to start your journey on Bazari
cta.beta_notice: Closed beta available for selected merchants

authGate.title: Access the Bazari app
authGate.description: Choose how you want to continue your journey with Bazari.
authGate.unlockAria: Unlock this device using your PIN
authGate.unlockDisabledAria: Unlock option disabled until you save a Bazari seed on this device
authGate.checkingDetail: Checking if this device already has an encrypted vault…
authGate.unlockHelper: Create or import an account on this device to enable the Unlock option.
authGate.unlockHelperReady: Encrypted vault detected. You can unlock this device with your PIN.

forms.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
forms.terms_required: You must accept the terms of use

new.product_desc: Sell a physical or digital product
new.category_desc: Navigate through 4 levels of categories to find the most specific one
new.basic_info_desc: Fill in the main information of your listing
new.title: Title
new.description_placeholder: Describe your product or service in detail...

new.what_to_list: What would you like to list?
new.what_to_list_desc: Choose whether you are selling a product or offering a service
new.success_message: Your listing has been published on the marketplace

listing.product_desc: Physical or digital item for sale
listing.category_desc: Select the most specific category possible
listing.title: Title

create.title: Create Bazari Account
create.subtitle: Write down your 12-word recovery phrase and keep it safe.
create.backupHelp: Keep your phrase offline. Never share it with anyone.

import.title: Import Existing Account
import.seedHint: Paste the exact phrase. Words are separated by a single space.

sessionExpired.title: Session expired
sessionExpired.description: For your security, please unlock and sign again to continue.

errors.title: Attention
errors.confirmationMismatch: The words you entered do not match the backup phrase.
errors.pinTooShort: PIN must have at least {{min}} digits.
errors.noStoredSeed: No encrypted seed found on this device.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Wallet overview
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor balances, tokens, and recent activity.
dashboard.chainError: Unable to load chain information. Data may be outdated.
dashboard.noAccountDescription: Select or import an account to use the wallet features.

tokens.title: Custom tokens
tokens.inputRequired: Enter an asset ID to continue.
tokens.notFound: Token metadata not found on chain.
tokens.empty: No extra tokens yet. Add an asset by ID.

balances.title: Balances
balances.description: Live balances for the active account.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.subtitle: Manage the local vault used for signing.
accounts.listDescription: Select the account used for signing and persistence on this device.
accounts.empty: No accounts stored yet. Create or import one to continue.

create.title: Create new account
create.description: Generate a recovery phrase and protect it with a PIN.
create.confirmationLabel: Type the full phrase to confirm
create.pinShort: PIN must have at least 6 digits.
create.confirmMismatch: The phrase does not match the generated words.
create.success: Account created and set as active.

import.title: Import account
import.description: Paste an existing mnemonic to store it securely.
import.mnemonicInvalid: The recovery phrase is not valid.
import.pinShort: PIN must have at least 6 digits.
import.success: Account imported and set as active.

export.warning: Keep this phrase secret. Anyone with it can access your funds.

remove.confirmText: Type the address to confirm removal. Make sure you have a backup before proceeding.
remove.mismatch: The confirmation does not match the address.

send.title: Send assets
send.subtitle: Create and sign transfers directly with your local vault.

errors.noVault: Encrypted vault not found on this device.

send.pinDescription: Enter your vault PIN to decrypt the signing key.
send.noAccountDescription: Import or create an account before sending funds.

receive.title: Receive assets
receive.subtitle: Share your address to receive transfers on Bazarichain.
receive.addressDescription: Present this address or QR code to receive tokens.
receive.networkHint: Only accept transfers from the Bazarichain network (token {{symbol}}).
receive.noAccount: Activate or import an account to display your address.

payment.title: Payment Summary
payment.description: Review the details before confirming payment.

cart.title: Shopping Cart

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: Explore our catalog and add items to your cart.

cart.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the entire cart?

summary.title: Order Summary
summary.taxNote: Taxes and shipping will be calculated at checkout.

sellerConflict.title: Different Seller
sellerConflict.description: Your cart already contains items from another seller.
sellerConflict.warning: You can only purchase from one seller at a time. Do you want to clear the cart and add this item?

cart.separateOrders: {{count}} separate orders will be created (one per store)

checkout.ownEscrow: Each order has its own escrow and tracking

limits.removeItems: Remove items from some stores to continue

pay.title: Payment

notFound.title: Order not found
notFound.description: The order you are looking for does not exist or was removed.

payment.title: Order Payment
payment.description: Confirm the details before making the payment.
payment.insufficient: Insufficient balance to cover amount, fee and ED.

escrow.step1: Your funds are RESERVED in your own account
escrow.step2: The seller only receives after you confirm delivery
escrow.step3: In case of dispute, the DAO can mediate
escrow.note: By paying, you will sign a transaction that reserves the funds in your wallet. The seller does NOT receive until you confirm receipt of the product.

pay.enterPin: Enter your PIN to confirm the payment

mine.title: My offers
mine.empty: You haven't created any offers yet.

new.title: New P2P offer
new.needPix: You must set a PIX key to publish offers.
new.phaseSoldOut: Phase {{phase}} sold out. Wait for next phase.

actions.needProof: Attach at least one receipt before marking as paid

escrow.title: BZR Escrow
escrow.note: Sign the transaction in your wallet (balances.transfer_keep_alive).

pix.wait: PIX key will be visible after escrow.

chat.title: Chat
chat.rateLimited: You have reached the message limit. Please try again shortly.

security.escrowFirst: PIX key is visible after BZR escrow.

validation.outOfRange: Amount out of this offer range.

toast.rangeOrder: Max must be greater than or equal to Min

info.title: About ZARI
info.desc1: ZARI is the governance token of the Bazari network, distributed in progressive phases through the P2P system.
info.desc2: Each phase has a fixed price in BZR and a limited supply. When a phase sells out, the next phase is automatically activated with a higher price.
info.totalSupply: Total supply: 30 million ZARI distributed via P2P.

escrow.noteZari: Sign the transaction in your wallet (assets.transfer_keep_alive).
escrow.notEscrowserZari: You are not responsible for locking the escrow in this order. Waiting for the other party to lock ZARI.
escrow.youAreEscrower: You are responsible for locking the escrow.
escrow.hint: To enable: free balance - fee - amount >= ED

cancel.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?

reason.awaitingFiat: Escrow confirmed; awaiting payment. Cancellation unavailable.
reason.awaitingConfirm: Payment marked; awaiting confirmation. Cancellation unavailable.

proposals.title: Proposals
proposals.emptyDescription: There are no proposals matching your filters

detail.title: Proposal Details
detail.votingActiveDescription: This proposal is in active voting. You can vote in favor (Aye) or against (Nay).

create.title: Create New Proposal
create.subtitle: Fill in the fields below to submit a new proposal
create.titleHelp: A clear and concise title for your proposal
create.beneficiaryHelp: Address that will receive the funds
create.preimageHashHelp: Preimage hash if you already submitted one
create.depositInfoDescription: Creating a proposal requires a deposit that will be returned if the proposal is accepted. The deposit amount varies according to the proposal type.

errors.notConnected: You need to be connected to create a proposal
errors.beneficiaryRequired: Beneficiary is required for treasury proposals
errors.valueRequired: Value must be greater than zero

vote.title: Vote on Proposal
vote.amountHelp: Amount of tokens you want to use for voting
vote.convictionHelp: Conviction determines how much your vote is worth and how long your tokens will be locked. Higher conviction = more vote weight, but longer lock period.

convictionDescriptions.none: Your vote counts 0.1x, but you can withdraw your tokens immediately after voting.
convictionDescriptions.locked1x: Your vote counts 1x and your tokens will be locked for 1 voting period.
convictionDescriptions.locked2x: Your vote counts 2x and your tokens will be locked for 2 voting periods.
convictionDescriptions.locked3x: Your vote counts 3x and your tokens will be locked for 4 voting periods.
convictionDescriptions.locked4x: Your vote counts 4x and your tokens will be locked for 8 voting periods.
convictionDescriptions.locked5x: Your vote counts 5x and your tokens will be locked for 16 voting periods.
convictionDescriptions.locked6x: Your vote counts 6x and your tokens will be locked for 32 voting periods.

errors.notConnected: You need to be connected to vote

treasury.title: Treasury
treasury.subtitle: Manage network funding proposals
treasury.emptyDescription: There are no proposals awaiting approval at the moment

council.title: Council & Technical Committee
council.subtitle: Elected members and their ongoing proposals

noMembersDescription.council: The council does not have elected members yet
noMembersDescription.technical: The technical committee does not have members yet

noProposalsDescription.council: There are no council proposals at the moment
noProposalsDescription.technical: There are no technical committee proposals at the moment

multisig.title: Multisig
multisig.subtitle: Manage multi-signature accounts and collective approvals
multisig.searchHelp: Enter a multisig account address to view its signatories and pending transactions
multisig.noPendingDescription: This multisig account has no transactions awaiting approval
multisig.emptyDescription: Enter a multisig account address above to start
multisig.executionNote: This transaction has reached the threshold and can be executed by any signatory.

banner.message: Test environment - Transactions and data are not real

hero.title: Access to Test Version
hero.subtitle: You are accessing Bazari's testnet environment — a development version open to the public for transparency, research, and community validation purposes.

warning.title: ⚠️ Test Environment
warning.description: You are accessing Bazari's testnet environment — a development version open to the public for transparency, research, and community validation purposes. Some flows may present errors, slowness, or incomplete functionalities as they are still being optimized for the official launch.

purpose.title: Why We're Sharing This
purpose.subtitle: The public release of this environment is part of Bazari's transparency and community engagement strategy.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Allow supporters, developers, and future users to follow the project's real progress.

innovation.title: Open Innovation
innovation.description: Represents Bazari's commitment to an Open Innovation model and participatory co-construction.

engagement.title: Community Engagement
engagement.description: Test functionalities and contribute constructive feedback before the official launch.

points.notFinal: This version does not represent the final product and may contain bugs or instabilities.
points.noRealTransactions: No transaction, data, or action performed in this environment should be interpreted as a real commercial or financial operation.
points.risks: Using the test environment implies awareness and acceptance of the risks inherent to development versions.
points.updates: Bazari may update, suspend, or reset the test environment without prior notice, according to the project's technical evolution.

strategic.title: Message for Media and Supporters
strategic.subtitle: The public availability of this link is not an official launch, but a strategic action of transparency and technical marketing, aligned with Web3 principles.

transparency.title: Institutional Transparency
transparency.description: By showing the real development stage

engagement.title: Community Engagement
engagement.description: Inviting supporters to participate in the ecosystem's evolution

strategic.finalMessage: This stance reinforces Bazari's image as a digital sovereignty project, built by the people and for the people, based on trust, decentralization, and open innovation.

cta.title: Start Exploring
cta.subtitle: Enter the test environment and discover the future of the decentralized economy.

welcome.title: Welcome to Bazari!
welcome.subtitle: Before you begin, it's important that you know...

alert.title: You are in a Test Environment (Testnet)
alert.description: This is a development version, open to the public for transparency and community validation.
alert.emphasis: Some flows may present errors, slowness, or incomplete functionalities.

transparency.title: Why are we sharing this?
transparency.description: Bazari believes in total transparency. By opening our testnet, we allow the community to follow the project's real development and contribute to its evolution.

welcome.indicator: This indicator will always be visible while you use the testnet
welcome.skip: I already know this, continue without reading

shippedInfo.title: When marked as shipped:
shippedInfo.noCancel: You won't be able to cancel the order

autoRelease.title: Auto-Release
autoRelease.description: Funds will be automatically released {{days}} days after shipping
autoRelease.confirmEarly: If you receive the product early, confirm delivery to release funds to the seller.

section.title: Shipping Information
section.description: Configure how you will ship this product

escrowTimeline.title: Protection Timeline
escrowTimeline.safetyInfo: You have {{days}} days after the estimated delivery to confirm receipt or open a dispute.

shippingOptions.title: Shipping Options
shippingOptions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to remove this shipping option?

pickup.title: Pickup Location
pickup.instructionsHint: E.g.: Next to the grocery store, gray building

checkout.title: Shipping Options
checkout.maxDeliveryNote: Delivery time considers the longest time among products

validation.minOneOption: Product must have at least 1 shipping option
validation.priceRequired: Price is required for fixed shipping
validation.freeAboveRequired: Enter the minimum value and normal price for conditional free shipping
validation.invalidDays: Delivery time must be between 1 and 90 days
